GOLF.original: Hold ~INPUT_ATTACK~ to zoom camera. ~n~Move ~PAD_RSTICK_LEFTRIGHT~ to rotate camera.
For greater accuracy, time your shot on the black line, and keep ~PAD_RSTICK_ALL~ straight. ~n~Hold ~INPUT_ATTACK~ to zoom camera. ~n~Move ~PAD_RSTICK_LEFTRIGHT~ to rotate camera.
GOLF.translated: 若要提高击球精度，在蓄力槽达到黑线时击球，同时控制好~PAD_RSTICK_ALL~的位置。~n~按住~INPUT_ATTACK~进行缩放。~n~用~PAD_RSTICK_LEFTRIGHT~旋转视角。

GOLF.original: Distance from target: ~1~.~1~m. Points: ~1~. Bonus points: 5
GOLF.translated: 距离目标：~1~.~1~m 得分：~1~ 奖励分：5

GOLF.original: Press ~INPUT_PICKUP~ to quit. ~n~Press ~INPUT_MOUSE_LMB~ to play again.

Use ~PAD_LSTICK_ALL~ to change shot position. ~n~Press ~PAD_A~ to start backswing. ~n~To hit the ball, press ~PAD_A~ when the descending power bar reaches the black marker. ~n~Press ~INPUT_PICKUP~ to exit.
GOLF.translated: 用~PAD_LSTICK_ALL~改变目标落点。~n~按~PAD_A~开始蓄力。~n~游标回落到黑线时按~PAD_A~击球。~n~按~INPUT_PICKUP~退出。

GOLF.original: Hit the ball near the targets to score points.
GOLF.translated: 将球打到目标附近以获得分数。

GOLF.original: Press ~INPUT_PICKUP~ to quit. ~n~Press ~INPUT_FRONTEND_ACCEPT~ to play again.
The closer the ball is to the target, the more points scored. Bonus points are awarded for hitting the target directly.
GOLF.translated: 球离目标越近，得分越高。直接命中目标可获得奖励分。

GOLF.original: Hold ~INPUT_FREE_AIM~ to zoom camera. ~n~Press ~INPUT_MOVE_LEFT~ and ~INPUT_MOVE_RIGHT~ to rotate camera.
GOLF.translated: 按住~INPUT_FREE_AIM~进行缩放。~n~按~INPUT_MOVE_LEFT~和~INPUT_MOVE_RIGHT~旋转视角。

GOLF.original: Opponent's total score: ~1~
You lost this game. Your score: ~1~. Opponent's score: ~1~.
GOLF.translated: 你输了。你的得分：~1~ 对手得分：~1~

GOLF.original: You drew this game. Your score: ~1~. Opponent's score: ~1~.
GOLF.translated: 平局。你的得分： ~1~ 对手得分：~1~

GOLF.original: Press ~PAD_A~ to hit the ball.
Move ~PAD_RSTICK_UP~ to hit the ball.
Press ~INPUT_PICKUP~ to quit. ~n~Press ~INPUT_FRONTEND_ACCEPT~ to go back to the game.
You won this game. Your score: ~1~. Opponent's score: ~1~.
GOLF.translated: 你赢了。你的得分：~1~ 对手得分：~1~

GOLF.original: Use ~PAD_RSTICK_ALL~ to change shot position. ~n~Press ~INPUT_MOUSE_LMB~ to start backswing. ~n~To hit the ball, press ~INPUT_MOUSE_LMB~ when the descending power bar reaches the black marker. ~n~Press ~INPUT_PICKUP~ to exit.
GOLF.translated: 用~PAD_RSTICK_ALL~改变目标落点。~n~按~INPUT_MOUSE_LMB~开始蓄力。~n~游标回落到黑线时按~INPUT_MOUSE_LMB~击球。~n~按~INPUT_PICKUP~退出。

GOLF.original: Balls left: ~1~
Points scored: ~1~
Distance from target: ~1~.~1~m. Points: ~1~
Your total score: ~1~
Are you sure you want to quit?
Press ~INPUT_PICKUP~ to quit. ~n~Press ~INPUT_MOUSE_LMB~ to go back to the game.
Use ~PAD_LSTICK_ALL~ to change shot position. ~n~Move ~PAD_RSTICK_DOWN~ to start swing. ~n~Move ~PAD_RSTICK_UP~ to hit the ball. ~n~Press ~INPUT_PICKUP~ to exit.
GOLF.translated: 用~PAD_LSTICK_ALL~改变目标落点。~n~移动~PAD_RSTICK_DOWN~开始蓄力。~n~移动~PAD_RSTICK_UP~击球。~n~按~INPUT_PICKUP~退出。
